verifier_guide_desc: Uphononongo lwakho lubumba indlela abafundi abeva nabazilungisa ngayo. Funda isikhokelo ngezantsi phambi kokuba uqale.
verifier_approach_desc: Akufuneki ube nemvelaphi yokufundisa — kuphela indlebe enobulungisa nendlela ecacileyo.
verifier_listen_title: Mamela Kuqala, Nika Amanqaku Emva Koko
verifier_listen_desc: Dlala ushicilelo lomfundi ngokupheleleyo ubuncinci kanye ngaphambi kokuba uchukumise amanqaku. Izigwebo ezingxamisekileyo ziyatshintsha ekuhambeni kwexesha.
verifier_consistent_desc: I-3 ithetha ukuthi "uyaqondakala ngokuzama." I-5 ithetha ukuthi isithethi sendalo besingayi kuthi nko. Beka iseshini nganye kwezi zimbini zokulinganisa kwaye uya kuhlala ulungile kwiimvavanyo ezimakhulu.
verifier_empathetic_desc: Abafundi baphucula ngokukhawuleza kakhulu ngamanqaku anyanisekileyo kunye noshicilelo oluhle lomzekelo. I-5 enobubele namhlanje iyabaphanga inkqubela yakusasa.
verifier_sound_desc: Ingaba izandi ngasinye (amaqhwiti, iivaweli, iikhonsonanti) zenziwa ngokuchanekileyo? Ungajongi iritmu nokukhethwa kwamagama — jonga kuphela izandi okuzivelayo.
verifier_rhythm_desc: Ingaba ibinzana libaleka ngokwendalo? Uxinzelelo, ukuma, nezikhokelo zephitshi kubalulekile apha. Umfundi angavakalisa isandi ngasinye ngokuchanekileyo kodwa asavakale engumntu oyimishini.
verifier_phrase_desc: Ingaba umfundi uthethe amagama afanelekileyo ngendlela efanelekileyo? Amagama ashiyiweyo okanye atshintshiweyo athoba la manqaku noba izandi ngasinye ziphelele.
verifier_ai_desc: I-AI yethu inika isihumusho nempendulo kuso sonke ushicilelo. Phawula ukuba uhlalutyo lwe-AI luchanekile okanye aluchanekanga — oku kusinceda siphucula inkqubo.
verifier_exemplar_desc: Emva kokunika amanqaku, zishicilele usithi ibinzana ngokuchanekileyo. Lo mzekelo uthunyelwa kumfundi kunye namanqaku akho ukuze beve into ekufuneka bejolise kuyo.
verifier_login_desc: Ngena kwaye utsibe ngqo koluphononongo lwakho olulandelayo lomgca.
verifier_register_desc: Lungiselela ngaphantsi komzuzu, emva koko uvule iprofayili yakho yomqinisekisi.
vsettings_activate_desc: Cwangcisa ubuni bakho obubonakalayo kwaye ujoyine eli qela lolwimi.
work_desc: Khetha umzamo womfundi kumgca. Xa uwubambile, unomzuzu omihlanu wokugqiba uphononongo lwakho.
work_claim_hint: Bamba nayiphi na into ngezantsi ukuze uqale.
work_not_activated_desc: Yiya kwiiSethingi ukuze uvule iprofayili yakho yomqinisekisi kolu lwimi.
work_queue_empty_desc: Akukho mizamo yabafundi efuna uphononongo okwangoku. Buya kwakhona kamva.
work_pending_desc: Cofa into ukuze uyibambe kwaye uqale ukuphonononga.
